Und ein sozial isolierter Mann, ein Hikikomori, verliebt sich in eine hÃ¼bsche Pizzabotin und verlÃ¤sst zum ersten Mal seit vielen Jahren seine Wohnung.

sources.title: Conman in Tokyo (ACTION CRIME in German, action comedy full movie, gangster films, action film)

metadata.Plot: An American teenager named Sean Boswell is a loner in school, however he challenges his rival for an illegal street racing, and he totals his car in the end of the race. To avoid time in prison he is sent to Tokyo to live with his father who is in the military. As soon as he arrives he discovers a new, fun but dangerous way of street racing in the underworld of the streets of Tokyo, Japan.
metadata.Actors: Lucas Black, Zachery Ty Bryan, Shad Moss
